issues.title: ESG scoring methodology not defined
issues.description: 'Environmental, Social, and Governance factors' mentioned but no detail on what these factors are or how they're measured
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'ESG scores from MSCI ESG Ratings (AAA to CCC scale) or detail proprietary methodology including: E - carbon emissions, water usage, waste; S - labor practices, diversity, community; G - board structure, executive pay, shareholder rights'

issues.title: 'Higher scores' threshold not defined
issues.description: 'Higher scores indicate better performance' but doesn't define what score qualifies as 'high'
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'High ESG score defined as MSCI rating of A or above (on AAA to CCC scale)'

issues.title: 'Periodically' update frequency not specified
issues.description: 'Updated periodically' is vague - could be daily, monthly, quarterly, annually
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'ESG scores updated monthly using MSCI ESG Ratings data feed'

issues.title: 'Strong ESG scores' not defined
issues.description: 'Strong ESG scores' is subjective without numerical threshold
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Strong ESG scores defined as MSCI ESG Rating of A or above, or top 50% of parent index by ESG score'

issues.title: 'Controversial activities' not defined
issues.description: Exclusion based on 'controversial activities' without defining what activities qualify
issues.suggested_fix: Define in Section 3 or specify: 'Controversial activities per MSCI Controversial Weapons Screen or specify: tobacco, weapons, gambling, adult entertainment'

issues.title: Weight tilting methodology not specified
issues.description: 'Tilt weights toward high ESG scorers' without specifying the tilting algorithm or magnitude
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Weights calculated as (Market Cap × ESG Score Multiplier) where multiplier ranges from 0.5 (lowest ESG) to 1.5 (highest ESG), normalized to 100%'

issues.title: 'Reasonable tracking error' not defined
issues.description: 'Reasonable tracking error' is subjective without numerical target
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Tracking error target of 1.5% annualized (1-year rolling), with maximum of 2.5%'

issues.title: 'Involved in controversial weapons' criteria missing
issues.description: Excludes controversial weapons but doesn't define what weapons qualify or revenue threshold
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Controversial weapons defined as nuclear weapons, cluster munitions, landmines per UN conventions. Companies excluded if >0% revenue from these weapons'

issues.title: 'Significant fossil fuel exposure' not quantified
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Significant fossil fuel exposure defined as >10% revenue from coal, oil, or natural gas extraction'

issues.title: 'Major ESG controversies' criteria missing
issues.description: 'Major' controversies not defined - severity, recency, or impact unclear
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Major controversies defined as MSCI ESG Controversy Score of 0-2 (Red Flag) within past 3 years'

issues.title: Parent index not identified
issues.description: References 'parent index' but doesn't specify which index
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Parent index: S&P 500' or other specific index
